00035 namespace Utilities.Web

00040     public static class HTML
00041     {
00042         #region Variables
00043 
00044         private const string GZIP = "gzip";
00045         private const string DEFLATE = "deflate";
00046 
00050         private static readonly Regex STRIP_HTML_REGEX = new Regex("<[^>]*>", RegexOptions.Compiled);
00051         #endregion
00052 
00053         #region Static Public Functions
00054 
00060         public static string Minify(string Input)
00061         {
00062             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00063                 return "";
00064             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, "/// <.+>", "");
00065             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00066                 return "";
00067             Input = Regex.Replace(Input, @">[\s\S]*?<", new MatchEvaluator(Evaluate));
00068             return Input;
00069         }
00070 
00076         public static string RemoveIllegalCharacters(string Input)
00077         {
00078             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00079             {
00080                 return Input;
00081             }
00082 
00083             Input = Input.Replace(":", string.Empty);
00084             Input = Input.Replace("/", string.Empty);
00085             Input = Input.Replace("?", string.Empty);
00086             Input = Input.Replace("#", string.Empty);
00087             Input = Input.Replace("[", string.Empty);
00088             Input = Input.Replace("]", string.Empty);
00089             Input = Input.Replace("@", string.Empty);
00090             Input = Input.Replace(".", string.Empty);
00091             Input = Input.Replace("\"", string.Empty);
00092             Input = Input.Replace("&", string.Empty);
00093             Input = Input.Replace("'", string.Empty);
00094             Input = Input.Replace(" ", "-");
00095             RemoveExtraHyphen(Input);
00096             RemoveDiacritics(Input);
00097             return HttpUtility.UrlEncode(Input).Replace("%", string.Empty);
00098         }
00099 
00105         public static string StripHTML(string HTML)
00106         {
00107             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(HTML))
00108                 return string.Empty;
00109 
00110             HTML=STRIP_HTML_REGEX.Replace(HTML, string.Empty);
00111             HTML = HTML.Replace("&nbsp;", " ");
00112             return HTML.Replace("&#160;", string.Empty);
00113         }
00114 
00120         public static bool ContainsHTML(string Input)
00121         {
00122             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00123                 return false;
00124 
00125             return STRIP_HTML_REGEX.IsMatch(Input);
00126         }

00134         public static void AddScriptFile(string File,string Directory)
00135         {
00136             System.Web.UI.Page CurrentPage = (System.Web.UI.Page)HttpContext.Current.CurrentHandler;
00137             if (!CurrentPage.ClientScript.IsClientScriptIncludeRegistered(typeof(System.Web.UI.Page), Directory + File))
00138             {
00139                 CurrentPage.ClientScript.RegisterClientScriptInclude(typeof(System.Web.UI.Page), Directory + File, HttpContext.Current.Server.MapPath(Directory + File));
00140             }
00141         }
00142 
00147         public static bool IsEncodingAccepted(string encoding)
00148         {
00149             return HttpContext.Current.Request.Headers["Accept-encoding"] != null && HttpContext.Current.Request.Headers["Accept-encoding"].Contains(encoding);
00150         }
00151 
00156         public static void SetEncoding(string encoding)
00157         {
00158             HttpContext.Current.Response.AppendHeader("Content-encoding", encoding);
00159         }
00160 
00165         public static void HTTPCompress(HttpContext context)
00166         {
00167             if (context.Request.UserAgent != null && context.Request.UserAgent.Contains("MSIE 6"))
00168                 return;
00169 
00170             if (HTML.IsEncodingAccepted(GZIP))
00171             {
00172                 context.Response.Filter = new GZipStream(context.Response.Filter, CompressionMode.Compress);
00173                 HTML.SetEncoding(GZIP);
00174             }
00175             else if (HTML.IsEncodingAccepted(DEFLATE))
00176             {
00177                 context.Response.Filter = new DeflateStream(context.Response.Filter, CompressionMode.Compress);
00178                 HTML.SetEncoding(DEFLATE);
00179             }
00180         }

00185         public static string RelativeRoot
00186         {
00187             get
00188             {
00189                 return VirtualPathUtility.ToAbsolute("~/");
00190             }
00191         }
00192 
00196         public static Uri AbsoluteRoot
00197         {
00198             get
00199             {
00200                 HttpContext context = HttpContext.Current;
00201                 if (context == null)
00202                     throw new System.Net.WebException("The current HttpContext is null");
00203 
00204                 if (context.Items["absoluteurl"] == null)
00205                     context.Items["absoluteurl"] = new Uri(context.Request.Url.GetLeftPart(UriPartial.Authority) + RelativeRoot);
00206 
00207                 return context.Items["absoluteurl"] as Uri;
00208             }
00209         }

00216         public static string DumpServerVars(HttpRequest Request)
00217         {
00218             StringBuilder String = new StringBuilder();
00219             String.Append("<table><thead><tr><th>Property Name</th><th>Value</th></tr></thead><tbody>");
00220             foreach (string Key in Request.ServerVariables.Keys)
00221             {
00222                 String.Append("<tr><td>"+Key + "</td><td>" + Request.ServerVariables[Key] + "</td></tr>");
00223             }
00224             String.Append("</tbody></table>");
00225             return String.ToString();
00226         }
00227

00297         public static string DumpSession(System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState Input)
00298         {
00299             StringBuilder String = new StringBuilder();
00300             foreach (string Key in Input.Keys)
00301             {
00302                 String.Append(Key + ": " + Input[Key].ToString() + "<br />Properties<br />" + Reflection.Reflection.DumpProperties(Input[Key]) + "<br />");
00303             }
00304             return String.ToString();
00305         }

00322         public static string DumpCache(System.Web.Caching.Cache Input)
00323         {
00324             StringBuilder String = new StringBuilder();
00325             foreach (DictionaryEntry Entry in Input)
00326             {
00327                 String.Append(Entry.Key + ": " + Entry.Value.ToString() + "<br />Properties<br />" + Reflection.Reflection.DumpProperties(Entry.Value) + "<br />");
00328             }
00329             return String.ToString();
00330         }

00372         public static string DumpCookies(HttpCookieCollection Input)
00373         {
00374             StringBuilder String = new StringBuilder();
00375             String.Append("<table><thead><tr><th>Name</th><th>Sub Name</th><th>Value</th></tr></thead><tbody>");
00376             foreach (string Key in Input.Keys)
00377             {
00378                 if (Input[Key].Values.Count > 1)
00379                 {
00380                     foreach(string SubKey in Input[Key].Values.Keys)
00381                     {
00382                         String.Append("<tr><td>" + Key + "</td><td>"+SubKey+"</td><td>");
00383                         String.Append(Input[Key].Values[SubKey]+"</td></tr>");
00384                     }
00385                 }
00386                 else
00387                 {
00388                     String.Append("<tr><td>" + Key + "</td><td></td><td>");
00389                     String.Append(Input[Key].Value + "</td></tr>");
00390                 }
00391             }
00392             String.Append("</tbody></table>");
00393             return String.ToString();
00394         }

00403         private static string RemoveExtraHyphen(string Input)
00404         {
00405             while (Input.Contains("--"))
00406             {
00407                 Input = Input.Replace("--", "-");
00408             }
00409 
00410             return Input;
00411         }
00412 
00418         private static string RemoveDiacritics(string Input)
00419         {
00420             string Normalized = Input.Normalize(NormalizationForm.FormD);
00421             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00422 
00423             for (int i = 0; i < Normalized.Length; i++)
00424             {
00425                 Char TempChar = Normalized[i];
00426                 if (CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory(TempChar) != UnicodeCategory.NonSpacingMark)
00427                     Builder.Append(TempChar);
00428             }
00429 
00430             return Builder.ToString();
00431         }
00432 
00438         private static string Evaluate(Match Matcher)
00439         {
00440             string MyString = Matcher.ToString();
00441             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(MyString))
00442                 return "";
00443             MyString = Regex.Replace(MyString, @"\r\n\s*", "");
00444             return MyString;
00445         }
00446         #endregion
00447     }
